summary: In 1713 Scotland, Rob Roy MacGregor is wronged by a nobleman and his nephew, becomes an outlaw in search of revenge while fleeing the Redcoats, and faces charges of being a Jacobite.
cast: Liam Neeson|Jessica Lange|John Hurt|Tim Roth|Eric Stoltz|Andrew Keir|Brian Cox|Brian McCardie|Gilbert Martin|Vicki Masson|Gilly Gilchrist|Jason Flemyng|Ewan Stewart|David Hayman|Brian McArthur|David Brooks Palmer|Myra McFadyen|Karen Matheson|Shirley Henderson|John Murtagh|Bill Gardiner|Valentine Nwanze|Richard Bonehill|Andrew Kybett|Peter MacArthur|Allan Sutherland
